description:
the Z-1 Assault is a balanced and 'powerful' assault rifle suitable for short and medium range engagements produced by <info>Z-Arm Tech</info>.
the Z-1 Assault uses <info>small caliber</info> ammunition, it is modeled after the M4 (most likely the Colt Commando variation) with a futuristic design. It has the word 'Z-1' right in front of its trigger. It has scratches and some duct tape wrapped over its stock, carry handle, grip and handguard, which proves this gun has been well used and is now in bad condition but still somewhat usable.

This weapon is <bad>poorly made</bad> and will <bad>easily malfunction</bad> and will <bad>not handle much if any beating</bad>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

the Z-2 LMP is a <info>small caliber</info> SMG ideal for fast movement and maneuverability produced by <info>Z-Arm Tech</info>
Z-2 LMP resembles a MP5 without the adjustable stock, the rear sight, has a reflex sight and a vertical foregrip. It has the word 'Z-2' right in front of its selective-fire switch. It has scratches & some duct tapes wrapped over its grip, which means this gun is now under bad condition but still usable.

This weapon is <bad>poorly made</bad> and will <bad>easily malfunction</bad> and will <bad>not handle much if any beating</bad>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

the Z-1 Assault is a balanced and 'powerful' assault rifle suitable for short and medium range engagements produced by <info>Z-Arm Tech</info>.
the Z-1 Assault uses <info>small caliber</info> ammunition, it is modeled after the M4 (most likely the Colt Commando variation) with a futuristic design. It has the word 'Z-1' right in front of its trigger. It has scratches, but most of the damages have been repaired with some patience.

This weapon is <color_yellow>okay</color> and will <color_yellow>rarely malfunction</color> and <color_yellow>will handle some beating.</color>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

the Z-2 LMP is a <info>small caliber</info> SMG ideal for fast movement and maneuverability produced by <info>Z-Arm Tech</info>.
Z-2 LMP resembles a MP5 without the adjustable stock, the rear sight, has a reflex sight and a vertical foregrip. It has the word 'Z-2' right in front of its selective-fire switch. It has scratches, but most if not all the damage has been fixed with some patience.

This weapon is <color_yellow>okay</color> and will <color_yellow>rarely malfunction</color> and <color_yellow>will handle some beating.</color>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

the Z-1 Assault is a balanced and 'powerful' assault rifle suitable for short and medium range engagements produced by <info>Z-Arm Tech</info>
the Z-1 Assault uses <info>small caliber</info> ammunition, it is modeled after the M4 (most likely the Colt Commando variation) with a futuristic design. It has the word 'Z-1' right in front of its trigger. It has scratches, but most of the damages have been repaired with some patience, it has also been reinforced with metal strips and it's barrel has been also upgraded.

This weapon is <good>reinforced</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

the Z-2 LMP is a <info>small caliber</info> SMG ideal for fast movement and maneuverability produced by <info>Z-Arm Tech</info>. 
Z-2 LMP resembles a MP5 without the adjustable stock, the rear sight, has a reflex sight and a vertical foregrip. It has the word 'Z-2' right in front of its selective-fire switch. It has scratches, but most if not all the damage has been fixed with some patience, it has also been reinforced with metal strips and it's barrel has been also upgraded.

This weapon is <good>reinforced</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

the HVM 001 is the first gun manufactured by <info>High Value Metrics (HVM)</info> 
it is the weakest gun in the line of weapons produced by this company. 
it uses a <info>small caliber</info> ammunition type, and looks like a futuristic Glock-shaped pistol that features its magazine placed under the barrel similar to the Mauser C96 with a stylish green camo pattern.

This weapon is <color_yellow>average</color> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

the HVM 002 is the second gun manufactured by <info>High Value Metrics (HVM)</info> 
it's the weakest SMG in the line of weapons produced by this company. 
it uses the same <info>small caliber</info> ammunition as the HVM 001, and is a bullpup SMG possibly modeled after an Uzi or an MP7 with a fixed stock, a vertical foregrip and an unused top rail with a stylish green camo pattern.

This weapon is <color_yellow>average</color> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

the HVM 005 G-Class is an assault rifle produced by <info>High Value Metrics (HVM)</info> 
it's the <bad>weakest</bad> assault rifle compared to it's competitors. 
it uses the same <info>small caliber</info> ammunition as the HVM 001 and HVM 002, it's a bullpup rifle, it is inspired by the L85 or the FAMAS with a blocky design with a stylish green camo pattern.

This weapon is <color_yellow>average</color> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

the HVM 008 is a low class LMG produced by <info>High Value Metrics (HVM)</info> 
it's the <bad>weakest</bad> LMG compared to it's competitors. it uses the same <info>small caliber</info> ammunition as the HVM 001 and HVM 002 
the HVM 008 is possibly inspired off of the combination of the M60 (appearance) and the MG34 (using drums as feed system) with a blocky design with a stylish green camo pattern.

This weapon is <color_yellow>average</color> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

the RIA 313 is one of the first pistols designed by <info>Rubicon Industries</info> 
it's a very light pistol and uses a <info>small caliber</info> ammunition type 
the weapon looks like a futuristic pistol that appears to be a combination of the M9 or SIG-Sauer P226 for its look and the Desert Eagle for its size, a large muzzle and a pair of re-designed sights, the weapon has a sleek dark gray and black metallic look to it.

This weapon is <good>good</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

The CM 205 is a pistol manufactured by <info>Critical Mass</info> 
The CM 205 seems to be a modified version of the CM 202, having a more detailed build on the exterior, a <good>larger magazine</good> and a telescopic sight, Its under-barrel magazine fed design is similar to the Mauser C96 and the TEC-9.
the choice of using a <info>small caliber</info> makes this weapon's magazine <good>hold more bullets</good>, while the internals make the bullet <good>travels twice as fast</good>. also the small caliber and powerful internals make this weapons able to <good>shoot automatically</good>.

This weapon is <good>good</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

The CM 225 is a pistol manufactured by <info>Critical Mass</info> 
The CM 205 seems to be a modified version of the CM 202, being more detailed in build and having more size on containing the <good>much larger clip</good>, Its under-barrel magazine fed design is similar to the Mauser C96 and the TEC-9.
the choice of using a <info>small caliber</info> makes this weapon's magazine hold <info>more bullets</info>, also being able to hold more bullets than its predecessor, while the internals make the bullets travel twice as fast. also the small caliber and powerful internals make this weapons able to <good>shoot automatically</good>.

This weapon is <good>good</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>

the Poison Claw is one of the only pistol designed by Rancor 
the weapon can be inspired by the look of the Vita-Saw from TF2n
it has a huge razor sharp blade under the weapon making it impossible to mount underbarrel accessories, and a small liquid tank on top covering the sights, the small liquid tank hold multiple liters of acid concentrated in an atomic shrinker enivoment, making for an effectively endless source of acid, the acid is then poured inside the bullet as you press the trigger to shoot off a bullet of concentrated acid inside of the enemy.

This weapon is <good>good</good> and will <good>probably not malfunction</good> and <good>will handle quite the beating.</good>

<info>Xeno's SAS4 Weapons pack Modded Content</info>
